As I enter tv pitch season I consider my career stats: 14 pitches, 12 sold, 10 written, 5 shot, 1 series made. Tough business, this tv thing

— josh friedman (@Josh_Friedman) July 25, 2012

I'd link to the new CW ad campaign, but I'm afraid it will give my computer cooties.

— Ryan McGee (@TVMcGee) July 25, 2012

Is it possible the CW marketing team has never seen #TVD? ...Don't answer that.

The CW's new slogan is "TV Now." I guess that's better than "TV to Bing About." I guess.

I think Walter White is just Basil Fawlty without the warmth.

"We have scale and we have reach and we can drive people into this immersive world" --TCA answer or supervillain threat?

No offense to my more progressive friends, but I ONLY support traditional violence. #justastandImtaking #tcas12

YouTube can't understand why we're not applauding. SHOW US THE CATS LEAPING OUT OF BOXES, AND WE WILL! #tcas12 #maru

tweets.author_name: Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas
tweets.html:
Oh hey it's stereotyping-a-culture veto time! #bb14

— Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas (@spooloflies) July 26, 2012

Every time I see a shot of Jenn I think to myself “Is this woman on the right show?” #BB14

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) July 26, 2012

CBS should reboot Big Brother, but with Survivor’s tone. It would be like what Nolan did for the Batman franchise after Batman and Robin.

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) July 26, 2012

I know that this isn’t going to be a popular opinion, but I think that Uncle Jerry gives some of the best confessionals in reality tv. #BB14

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) July 26, 2012

I’m not sure Dan packed an adequate number of tee shirts for his stay in the Big Brother House. #whatisthewhitesplotch?

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) July 26, 2012

I'm so impressed by Kyle Chandler & Connie Britton on Fri Night Lights S1. (I'm tweeting this from fall 2006, WAY ahead of the curve.)

— Mark Harris (@MarkHarrisNYC) July 26, 2012

America, is it to soon for a movie about a group of hot-headed, paranoid white guys starting their own neighborhood watch?

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) July 26, 2012

@fymaxwell Kevin James or I'm not going.
